subject: p17770657
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to : Hyperinflation reflects COPD. Heart size is normal. There is no pulmonary edema or appreciable pleural effusion. Sternal augmentation and stabilization device unchanged in position. A small amount of retrosternal pneumomediastinum is to be expected. No evidence of bleeding.
